title: ContactManager c++ API doesn't work unless there is a subscriber to `~/physics/contacts`

content.raw: Some days ago I realized that the gazebo::physics::contactManager misses some contacts. I discovered that a model could have first a conatct being not detected by the class, and then being detected later if the user activates the view->contacts option in the gazebo client. My current code to solve the problem uses a contact topic subscriber and is available on this page: http://answers.gazebosim.org/question/12317/some-contacts-not-detected/?comment=12525#post-id-12525
